nodes.text: LX-R5, also known as Ellex, was an R5 series astromech droid that served the Jedi Order, working alongside the Jedi Master Kelleran Beq and the protocol droid AD-3.
LX-R5 was an astromech droid who served Jedi Master Kelleran Beq. Alongside the protocol droid AD-3, he accompanied Beq when he supervised Padawans' Jedi Trials.

LX-R5 was an astromech droid with a yellow trapezoid dome and a white chassis with yellow and orange features. He had a male programming and spoke Binary. He was frequently teased by his droid companion AD-3, who made remarks about his exhaust on at least two occasions. AD-3 also once described him as a fashionista. According to AD-3, LX-R5 was sensitive about his rust. LX-R5 also appeared to be annoyed with AD-3 positioning herself as Master Beq's favorite droid.

LX-R5 first appeared as a supporting character in the first episode of Star Wars: Jedi Temple Challenge, which premiered on June 10, 2020 on YouTube. According to the show's creator Scott Bromley, the droid was named after his young nephew Alex and took 16 days to build. LX-R5 was operated off-camera by prop builder Michael McMaster..
